title: Uchuusen Sagittarius
alternative_title: Spaceship Sagittarius, The Space Sagittarius,  宇宙船サジタリウス
description: Working for a multi-purpose space agency, Toppy and Rana make friends with Giraffe, a scientist, and go through various adventures in space. The three encounter danger at times, but their friendship always saves them just in the nick of time.
